Simple features. Powerful results.

SportKeeper keeps membership billing simplified, while giving you all the tools your gym needs to be successful.

Features

Our passion is helping you to build yours. Here are some of the features you can look forward to having as part of your new member management software.

Automatic Payment Workflows

Create recurring memberships that are charged automatically by credit card or bank payment. Individual or complex family memberships can be built easily with an intuitive and easy-to-use membership builder.

  • Supports Optional Setup Fees

  • Accept Payments Via Stripe or ACHWorks

  • Supports Non-Recurring, Cash-Based, and Punch Card Memberships

Digital Waivers

Our system is designed around requiring a digitally signed waiver to become a member. No need for 3rd party waiver systems

  • Digital Record of Signature Associated with Member

  • No Limit to the Number of Waivers You Can Create

  • Waivers are Fully Customizable

A Kiosk, Accessible Anywhere

You can run the kiosk on iPads or other devices, and your members can check in using a pin pad, or by scanning a bar code. New members can complete a waiver and automatically be part of your facility in minutes.

  • Designed to Run on Tablets

  • Member Checkin Via Pin Code or Barcode Scanner

  • Supports Automatic Checkin as a Seperate Kiosk.

Schedule and Sell Events

This will allow you to put together meetings or public events from anywhere you have access to the internet.

  • Members Can Book Events Online Using Stripe

  • Email Confirmations Handled Automatically

  • Limit an Event to a Certain Number of Seats (Helpful During Crazy Pandemics)

A Modern Point-of-Sale

Swipe credit cards with best-in-class service via Stripe, while managing your fleet of pre-certified card readers from within our app. All readers natively support EMV chip cards and contactless payment methods.

  • Stripe Terminal Requires Separate Purchase

  • Can Swipe or Enter Cards for Payment

  • Make Point-of-Sale Transactions Fast

Access by API

With an open, RESTful API, you can connect your member management system to the tools and software that run your facility without big, expensive integration work.

  • Integration with MailChimp and Zapier out-of-the-box

  • Simple and Clear Endpoint Documentation

  • Easily Extend Software Functionality for Your Needs

SportKeeper, member management made simple.
